original: 介紹《三國群英傳8》的外交、輔臣系統。包含「計略(知己知彼)」、「計略(親善)」、「輔臣設置」等功能用途，了解戰鬥以外牽制敵人之法和輔臣工作效果。
text: Introduce the diplomatic and auxiliary minister system of "Three Kingdoms Heroes 8". Contains functions such as "strategy (know oneself and the enemy)", "strategy (goodwill)", and "auxiliary setting" to understand the method of restraining the enemy outside of combat and the effect of auxiliary ministers.
